Connect with SimpliRoute, the last-mile: Connect with SimpliRoute, the last-mile delivery optimization platform. Manage clients, vehicles, visits, routes, and optimize your delivery operations.
Your SimpliRoute API token. You can find: Your SimpliRoute API token. You can find this in your SimpliRoute account settings under API section.

Retrieve the list of existing routes.
